comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Just download the eclipse 3.2
2.Extract it to C:\ProgramFile\Eclipse
3.Then run the eclipse. It will ask for workspace place then it will give message "Check log file" with its path.


More information:
This is the error i got from log file.

What VM are you using.  The complete log should tell you.  The stack trace looks like you hit a bug that is in J2SE 1.4.1.  Eclipse reqiures 1.4.2 or higher.

I'm getting essentially the same trace with 3.3M5 and 3.3M5eh and java 1.6.0 on XP SP2.

Oops, apologies. I only thought I was using Java 1.6.0. Just need to find out why 1.4.1 is still the default when I don't start Eclipse via a short cut.
See bug 174012 for why Java 1.4.1 was chosen instead of 1.6 as expected
